name: ESTATE of Anna INGAGLIO, Deceased. Appeal of Josephine HATHAWAY, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: ESTATE of Anna INGAGLIO, Deceased. Appeal of Josephine HATHAWAY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Delaware County, Orphans’ Court Division, entered April 8, 1980, reversed. The matter is remanded to the Court of Common Pleas of Delaware County, Orphans’ Court Division, for the holding of an evidentiary hearing to determine if appellant’s noncompliance with a directive of that court was contemptuous.
LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: James J. Heffernen, Norristown, for appellant.
William J. Furber, Jr., Norristown, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 502
ESTATE of Anna INGAGLIO, Deceased. Appeal of Josephine HATHAWAY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 21, 1980.
Decided Jan. 27, 1981.
James J. Heffernen, Norristown, for appellant.
William J. Furber, Jr., Norristown, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
